title: From railways to 5G: why China is plugging into the Digital Silk Road
description: Belt and road infrastructure deals have taken a back seat as countries struggle with debt and their priorities shift, analysts say.

title: Antony Blinken urges Beijing to use influence in Israel-Gaza conflict
description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke with China Foreign Affairs Minister Wang Yi on the pair’s first call since the Hamas attacks on Israel a week ago.

title: Israel-Hamas war: Chinese social media erupts in war of words as Palestine crisis divides opinion
description: Deadly Israel-Hamas conflict in the Gaza Strip has sparked fierce debate on Chinese social media, with even embassies caught up in the storm.

title: China’s stance on Ukraine war is critical to good relations with EU, bloc’s foreign policy chief says
description: Josep Borrell urges Beijing to use its influence over Russia to help revive the Black Sea grain deal and end war as visit to China ends.

title: Thai lunar weather instrument set to join China’s Chang’e 7 mission to the moon
description: Scientists developing sensor to study solar storms and cosmic rays during lunar orbit

title: Israel-Gaza war: China’s Middle East point man Zhai Jun meets Arab League envoys in latest bid to defuse crisis
description: China will continue humanitarian aid to Gaza, special Middle East envoy Zhai Jun told Arab League delegates while reiterating support for ‘two-state solution’, Chinese foreign ministry statement says.

title: China-Kazakhstan to share migration data, closing route for some, including from Xinjiang, keen to bypass Beijing
description: Kazakhstan bill comes after years of efforts by Astana to crack down on dual citizenship and leads up to visa-free regime with China.

title: When China’s military lagged behind US, it pursued ‘assassin’s mace’ tactic. Smart weaponry and AI is changing that
description: China’s focus on versatility, such as autonomous vehicles and AI-equipped weapons, is in contrast to weapons designed for asymmetrical warfare. The US also sees technology as a way to shape the parameters of a potential conflict.

title: China defends Africa investments in run-up to belt and road forum
description: As it prepares for next week’s belt and road forum, China is making the case for its role in financing development in Africa and filling the ‘funding gap’ which continues to mar the advancement of the continent’s economies.
